product.name: Maybelline Color Show Nail Lacquer Jewels
product.description: Maybelline Color Show Nail Lacquer Jewels collection features jeweled nail lacquer top coats straight from the shows!Features:Adorns your nails with textured gem effectsTrendy top coat nail art designsEasy-flow brushFormaldehyde, DBP and Toluene freeShade Range: (left to right: Mosaic Prism, Platinum Adorn)For Best Results:First apply a clear base coat to prevent your nails from yellowing and to help your nail color last longer. Choose a base shade and with one sweep, paint the first line of nail polish up the center of your nail starting from the base to the tip.For the cleanest look, be sure to leave a small space at the base of the nail. Then apply nail color to the rest of the nail. Pick your textured top coat and paint over your base shade for a street styled nail art look.
